statements: SELECT * FROM IrrigationControl;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IrrigationControl WHERE irrigation_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT id, device_name, last_irrigation_time FROM IrrigationControl ORDER BY last_irrigation_time DESC;
SELECT AVG(last_irrigation_time) AS average_irrigation_time FROM IrrigationControl;
SELECT device_id, sensor_data FROM IrrigationControl WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, device_name, sensor_data FROM IrrigationControl WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM IrrigationControl WHERE last_irrigation_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM IrrigationControl GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationControl WHERE sensor_data->>'temperature' > 25;
SELECT device_name, last_irrigation_time FROM IrrigationControl ORDER BY last_irrigation_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_location FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationData WHERE soil_moisture >= 3.0 AND humidity <= 60.0;
SELECT device_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM IrrigationData GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY avg_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_location, device_status FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_location LIKE '%room%';
SELECT device_name, device_location, data_timestamp, soil_moisture FROM IoTDevices JOIN IrrigationData ON IoTDevices.device_id = IrrigationData.device_id WHERE soil_moisture > 50;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM IrrigationData GROUP BY device_id HAVING avg_temperature > 25 AND avg_humidity < 80;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM measurements ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT measurement_id, sensor_id, measurement_value FROM measurements WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY measurement_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE status = TRUE;

SELECT measurements.measurement_value, measurements.timestamp, sensors.sensor_type FROM measurements JOIN sensors ON measurements.sensor_id = sensors.sensor_id WHERE measurements.measurement_value > 50 ORDER BY measurements.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE scheduled_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';

SELECT irrigation_schedule.*, sensors.location FROM irrigation_schedule JOIN measurements ON irrigation_schedule.measurement_id = measurements.measurement_id JOIN sensors ON measurements.sensor_id = sensors.sensor_id WHERE irrigation_schedule.water_required > 1000 ORDER BY irrigation_schedule.scheduled_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSystems;
SELECT system_id, location, sensor_id, sensor_type, status FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT data_id, sensor_id, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE moisture_level > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature < 30 AND humidity > 70;
SELECT location, sensor_type, status FROM IrrigationSystems WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSystems;
SELECT location, sensor_type FROM IrrigationSystems WHERE status='active';
SELECT * FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT data_id, moisture_level, timestamp FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE moisture_level > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature < 30 AND humidity > 60 ORDER BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM device_data;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM device_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT zone_id, name, description FROM irrigation_zone WHERE location = 'Backyard';
SELECT schedule_id, zone_id, start_time, end_time FROM irrigation_schedule ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT zone_id, name FROM irrigation_zone WHERE location = 'Garden';
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM irrigation_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT data_id, timestamp, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT control_id, zone_id, status FROM irrigation_control WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
